about_the_game:
Heavily inspired by the Retro graphics style of the old PSX games, Dead Sparrows bring you an Action filled gameplay!


Overview

Dead Sparrows is a single player, gameplay focused experience. You can freely choose from between three different characters with their own unique gameplay mechanics and use the unique skills they bring to combat and exploration to progress furtner into the game.

Features

Each character has their own individual skill trees where you can further unlock and improve their abilities inside and outside of combat.

Explore maps with designs heavily inspired by old 3D games of the 90's.

Solve engaging puzzles and unlock secrets that boost your combat power or award unique equipment.

Each character can use multiple abilites and has specialized weapon types they can use, and an ability tree to customize how you want to play them.

More game mechanics and levels will be added over time with subsequent updates!

  • Processor: Core i5 2.8GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent DX11 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
